inclusion.criterion: COPD with a FEV1/FVC <0.7 after bronchodilatation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Optimal medical treatment of COPD, ie. inhaled steroids, long-acting β2-agonist.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients are able to give verbal consent and sign a written consent form and understand Danish-
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severely depressed level of consciousness / confusion / non-cooperative.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe hypoxia, such as requiring more than 15L O2/min.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Vomiting and high risk for aspiration.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent abdominal, facial or upper airway surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Malignancy or life expectancy <6 months because of disease other than COPD.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient admitted with a NIV-requiring exacerbation of COPD. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial due to severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living.
